predicate.note: Frames file for 'deplore' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.2, Framenet entry Judgement.

example.name: pretty easy
example.text: Mr. Gelbart deplores the obfuscation, the circumlocution and the debasement of language he sees on all sides.
example.arg: the obfuscation, the circumlocution and the debasement of language he sees on all sides
